---
id: purge-invocation
title: "Purge an invocation"
description: "Purge the given invocation. This cleanups all the state for the given invocation. This command applies only to completed invocations."
sidebar_label: "Purge an invocation"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "patch api-method"
info_path: adminapi/admin-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Purge an invocation"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/invocations/{invocation_id}/purge"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Purge the given invocation. This cleanups all the state for the given invocation. This command applies only to completed invocations.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"invocation_id","in":"path","description":"Invocation identifier.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

An invocation can be purged only when completed.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Error description response","description":"Error details of the response","type":"object","required":["message"],"properties":{"message":{"type":"string"},"restate_code":{"title":"Restate code","description":"Restate error code describing this error","type":"string","nullable":true}}}}}}}}
